alert.note: Alert for Yavapai (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 26 at 11:52AM MST until July 26 at 2:30PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 230 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON FOR AREAS NEAR WILHOIT ALONG STATE ROUTE 89 IN YAVAPAI COUNTY... At 1149 AM MST, Doppler radar and automated rain gauges indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Between 0.75 and 2.15 inches of rain have fallen according to area rain gauges. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar and automated gauges. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Wilhoit. This includes the following highways... State Route 89 between mile markers 290 and 298. This includes the following creeks, washes and rivers... Board Creek, Kirkland Creek, Orofino Wash, Copper Basin Wash, Sheppard Wash, Skull Valley Wash, Hassayampa River and Finch Wash. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR AND GAUGE INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
